ðŸ’¡ cap | JavaScript
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a modern, privacy-preserving, and user-friendly alternative to traditional CAPTCHA systems for websites and APIs, preventing bots and abuse without requiring users to solve visual puzzles.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ SHA-256 proof-of-work challenges â€¢ Lightweight and fast (~20kb, zero dependencies) â€¢ Privacy-first, no telemetry â€¢ Fully customizable via CSS variables â€¢ Standalone mode with Docker
ðŸ“– Summary: Cap is a privacy-first, self-hosted CAPTCHA alternative that replaces traditional visual challenges with a lightweight, JavaScript-based proof-of-work system. It aims to be fast, dependency-free, and easily integrable into modern web applications, offering a more accessible and private user experience.

âœ¨ dtop | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Monitoring Docker containers across multiple hosts directly from the terminal.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Real-time monitoring â€¢ Lightweight â€¢ Multi-host support â€¢ Dozzle integration â€¢ Log streaming
ðŸ“– Summary: dtop is a terminal-based dashboard for real-time Docker container monitoring across multiple hosts. It provides instant visibility into container status, resource usage, and key metrics directly in the command line, with integration for viewing container logs via Dozzle.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project â€¢ Homepage ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

âœ¨ ytconverter | Python
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Downloading and converting YouTube videos from the command line.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Video Downloading â€¢ Audio Downloading â€¢ Multiple video download â€¢ Subtitles download support â€¢ Playlist download
ðŸ“– Summary: YTConverter is a Python-based CLI tool for downloading and converting YouTube videos. It leverages yt-dlp and ffmpeg to offer features like format conversion, subtitle downloads, playlist support, and customizable download paths, all through an interactive terminal interface.
ðŸ”— Links: â€¢ View Project ================ ðŸ”“ Open Source

ðŸ’¡ Dorion | Rust
ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: To provide a more performant and customizable Discord experience on less powerful hardware.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Alternative Discord client â€¢ Lightweight and smaller footprint â€¢ Snappier startup â€¢ Supports themes â€¢ Supports plugins
ðŸ“– Summary: Dorion is a lightweight, alternative Discord client built with Rust and Tauri, designed for lower-spec or storage-constrained PCs. It offers a snappier experience and supports customization through themes and plugins.
